data.title: Desmond Floyd - Football
data.meta_description: Desmond Floyd (11) Linebacker  - At Charlotte:  Signed with the 49ers on Feb. 4, 2015 as part of the program’s fourth signee class ... Final year of eligibility
data.text:
At Charlotte: Signed with the 49ers on Feb. 4, 2015 as part of the program’s fourth signee class ... Final year of eligibility in 2015 as a 5th-year grad student. 2015: Played in nine games, making four starts ... started each of the first four games of the year ... had 16 tackles with 14 solo, 4.0 TFL and 2.0 sacks ... added 3 FF, 3 PBU and 1 QBh ... had high of 5 tackles (5 solo) with a TFL and PBU vs. Marshall, 10/31 ... had 2 tackles vs. Presbyterian, at Middle Tennessee, vs. Southern Miss and at FIU ... forced fumbles in three consecutive games (at MT, FAU, Temple) ... led team and ranked T3rd in C-USA with 3 FF (.33/gm) ... sacks came vs. FAU and USM ... added TFL vs. Presbyterian.

at Wake Forest: Played last three seasons at Wake Forest ... 10 games with 12 tackles in 2014 ... 2.0 tackles for loss and 1.5 sacks with 4 quarterback hurries ... 11 games in 2013 with 11 tackles (7 solo; 3 TFL; 1 sack) ... had 3 solo tackles at Maryland ... TFL vs. Florida State ... six games as a red-shirt freshman in 2012 for first varsity letter ... made 4 tackles (all solo) ... red-shirt during the 2011 season.

at Union County High: earned all-Area and all-Region honors at Union County H.S. ... selected to South Carolina’s North-South game ... had 49 tackles, 25 TFL, 15 sacks and 29 QBh as a senior ... played for coach David Lipsey ... helped team reach state playoffs in 2009 and 2010.

Personal: Born on February 3, 1993...Parents are Joe and Jackie Floyd... Siblings are William Floyd, Joe Floyd Jr., and Nikki Floyd-Parks...Transfer from Wake Forest with a degree in communications... Continuing education through the teacher’s certification program... Enjoys fishing.

Year G-S UA-A-Tck TFL SK INT FF PBU

2015 9-4 14-2-16 4.0 2.0 0 3 3
